tool_description: The Quotes API is a simple API that returns an inspirational quote and its author from our curated database of quotes.
name: Quotes
title: Quotes

api_list.name: /quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://timshim-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "timshim-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://timshim-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "timshim-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
